trans-unit.source: Specifies the contextual information about an application thread.
trans-unit.target: Specifica le informazioni contestuali su un thread dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: You can use the ApplicationContext class to redefine the circumstances that cause a message loop to exit.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare la classe ApplicationContext per ridefinire le circostanze che determinano un ciclo di messaggi uscire dall'installazione.

trans-unit.source: By default, the ApplicationContext listens to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed> event on the application's main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, then exits the thread's message loop.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il ApplicationContext è in ascolto il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>principale dell'evento nell'applicazione <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, quindi termina il ciclo di messaggi del thread.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref> class with no context.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"> </xref> classe senza contesto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A> is not overridden, the message loop of the thread terminates when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.MainForm%2A> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>non è sottoposto a override, il ciclo di messaggi del thread termina quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.MainForm%2A>viene chiuso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.MainForm%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The main <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> of the application to use for context.
trans-unit.target: Il principale <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> dell'applicazione da utilizzare per il contesto.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>occupata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose()` (metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`richiama il metodo Dispose protetto con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro è true, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>riferimenti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il `Dispose()` metodo di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Terminates the message loop of the thread.
trans-unit.target: Termina il ciclo di messaggi del thread.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo chiama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ExitThread and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A> do not actually cause the thread to terminate.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ExitThread e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>eseguire non è effettivamente il thread venga terminato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadExit> event to which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object listens.
trans-unit.target: Questi metodi generano il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadExit>evento a cui il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>resta in attesa dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadExit>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object then terminates the thread.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>oggetto quindi termina il thread.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>

trans-unit.source: Terminates the message loop of the thread.
trans-unit.target: Termina il ciclo di messaggi del thread.

trans-unit.source: This method is called from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread%2A> and ExitThreadCore do not actually cause the thread to terminate.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread%2A>ed ExitThreadCore non determina effettivamente il thread venga terminato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadExit> event to which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object listens.
trans-unit.target: Questi metodi generano il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadExit>evento a cui il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>resta in attesa dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadExit>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object then terminates the thread.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>oggetto quindi termina il thread.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>

trans-unit.source: Attempts to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the application context is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Tentativo di liberare risorse ed eseguire altre operazioni di pulizia prima che il contesto dell'applicazione venga recuperato da garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo esegue l'override <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e pulisce le risorse chiamando `Dispose(false)`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup.
trans-unit.target: Eseguire l'override `Dispose(Boolean)` per personalizzare la pulizia.

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Il codice dell'applicazione non deve chiamare questo metodo. un oggetto `Finalize` metodo viene richiamato automaticamente durante l'operazione di garbage collection, a meno che la finalizzazione del garbage collector non è stata disabilitata da una chiamata al <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [metodi Finalize e distruttori](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [si esegue l'override del metodo Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> to use as context.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> da utilizzare come contesto.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> for this context.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà determina il principale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>per questo contesto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This property can change at any time.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è possibile modificare in qualsiasi momento.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A> is not overridden, the message loop of the thread terminates when the `mainForm` parameter closes.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>non è sottoposto a override, il ciclo di messaggi del thread termina quando il `mainForm` viene chiuso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> to use as context.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> da utilizzare come contesto.

trans-unit.source: Calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore*>, which raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ThreadExit"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Chiamate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore*>, che genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ThreadExit"> </xref> evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore*>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione predefinita di questo metodo chiama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThreadCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che ha generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un oggetto che contiene dati relativi al controllo.

trans-unit.source: Any type derived from the <xref:System.Object> class can be assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi tipo derivato dalla <xref:System.Object>classe può essere assegnata a questa proprietà.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the Tag property is set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà Tag è impostata tramite la finestra di progettazione Windows Form, è possibile assegnare solo testo.

trans-unit.source: A common use for the Tag property is to store data that is closely associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Un utilizzo comune per la proprietà Tag consiste nell'archiviare i dati che sono strettamente associati al controllo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a control that displays information about a customer, you might store a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains the customer's order history in that control's Tag property so the data can be accessed quickly.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si dispone di un controllo che visualizza le informazioni relative a un cliente, è possibile archiviare un <xref:System.Data.DataSet>accedere rapidamente ai dati, che contiene la cronologia degli ordini del cliente nella proprietà Tag del controllo.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che contiene dati relativi al controllo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the message loop of the thread should be terminated, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread*>.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il ciclo di messaggi del thread deve essere terminato, chiamando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.ExitThread*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
